Uses of Package
com.esri.mo2.map.core

Packages that use com.esri.mo2.map.core
com.esri.mo2.map.core Defines Layout, Map, and MapElement-related interfaces that could be implemented as either visual or non-visual components. 
com.esri.mo2.map.dpy Support for major Map components. 
com.esri.mo2.map.elt Provides classes and interfaces for a common set of map elements that can be added directly or indirectly to either UI-based or non-UI-based ElementContainer(s). 
com.esri.mo2.svr.map Provides components for developing server-side applications that could be run within any J2EE server or as a standalone application. 
com.esri.mo2.ui.bean Java beans and associated classes. 
com.esri.mo2.ui.lyt Contains the visual components of the layout framework application. 
 

Classes in com.esri.mo2.map.core used by com.esri.mo2.map.core
Canvas
          defines methods that are common to both a Map and a Layout.
Element
          An Element object is a kind of map data that could be added to any ElementContainer and Layout objects for either client and server sides.
ElementContainer
          An ElementContainer is a kind of container that manipulate Element objects added to it.
Layout
          Layout interface adds more functionality on top of the ElementContainer such as getting all the added elements, selected elements and MapElement(s), and creating images for the given size and extent including thumbnail images for the whole layout.
 

Classes in com.esri.mo2.map.core used by com.esri.mo2.map.dpy
Element
          An Element object is a kind of map data that could be added to any ElementContainer and Layout objects for either client and server sides.
ElementContainer
          An ElementContainer is a kind of container that manipulate Element objects added to it.
 

Classes in com.esri.mo2.map.core used by com.esri.mo2.map.elt
BackgroundLayer
          This interface defines the APIs for an element's background layer.
BorderLayer
          This interface defines the APIs for an element's border layer.
DropshadowLayer
          This interface defines the APIs for an element's drop shadow layer.
Element
          An Element object is a kind of map data that could be added to any ElementContainer and Layout objects for either client and server sides.
GroupElement
          A GroupElement is an ordered collection of Element(s).
Legend
          A Legend is an explanation of map contents which are consisted of a series of layers.
NorthArrow
          NorthArrow interface defines a set of methods needed for a NorthArrow object.
ScaleBar
          ScaleBar interface defines a set of methods to draw a ScaleBar to a given graphic context and getter/setter methods for accessing the properties of a ScaleBar objects.
 

Classes in com.esri.mo2.map.core used by com.esri.mo2.svr.map
AcetateLayer
          An AcetateLayer is a layer that could be added to a Map object and sits on top of other map layers.
BaseLayout
          A layout component that implements Layout model interface.
Map
          This interface identifies an object as a Map.
OverviewMap
          This class displays one or more layers on a Map at a larger extent compared with the Map.
 

Classes in com.esri.mo2.map.core used by com.esri.mo2.ui.bean
Element
          An Element object is a kind of map data that could be added to any ElementContainer and Layout objects for either client and server sides.
 

Classes in com.esri.mo2.map.core used by com.esri.mo2.ui.lyt
Canvas
          defines methods that are common to both a Map and a Layout.
ElementContainer
          An ElementContainer is a kind of container that manipulate Element objects added to it.
Layout
          Layout interface adds more functionality on top of the ElementContainer such as getting all the added elements, selected elements and MapElement(s), and creating images for the given size and extent including thumbnail images for the whole layout.
